author: Johanna M
title: What's not to like!
text:
Absolute gem of a hotel, from the amazing decor of the lobby to the quaintness of the high ceilings rooms, comfy bed, quality bedding and spotlessly clean, thick fluffy towels and a great shower, free safe in the room, the tea, coffee and muffins for free in the morning is a great touch but Dunking donuts/ subway is over the road if you need something more,
Now the location, wow, it's perfection. Central to everything you need but not the noise and craziness of time square, we loved it. All of it, the super friendly staff, the ice bucket and corkscrew in the room, the ice machine located down the stairs which was wonderful for a cheeky pre dinner bottle of bubbles in the room, we felt safe walking back after dinner and drinks even in the early hours of the morning, great bar across the road, steak tartare was a winner.
Also, you can leave your bags/ cases in a locked room just off reception if you have a later flight, overall a fantastic hotel, we felt we had a five star New York hotel experience for a far lower price, highly recommend and thanks to all at the wolcott for making our stay so fabulous
